Line 27: Line 27:
The suite is ostensibly [[cross-platform]], though it is primarily targeted at [[Linux distribution]]s which follow the interoperability standards set out by the [[freedesktop.org]] group. It uses the [[software libraries]] provided by the [[D-Bus]] and [[PolicyKit]] projects to handle [[inter-process communication]] and [[computer privilege]] negotiation.
The suite is ostensibly [[cross-platform]], though it is primarily targeted at [[Linux distribution]]s which follow the interoperability standards set out by the [[freedesktop.org]] group. It uses the [[software libraries]] provided by the [[D-Bus]] and [[PolicyKit]] projects to handle [[inter-process communication]] and [[computer privilege]] negotiation.
